purpose: To provide a comprehensive tutorial for building and understanding Pydantic-based AI agents using local models and the Ollama framework.
principle: Encourages the use of Pydantic for data validation and settings management, promoting best practices in building AI agents.
reusability: Designed with modular components that can be reused across different projects, allowing developers to easily integrate AI capabilities into their applications.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may imply incomplete features, potential bugs, and limited support for advanced use cases.
name: pydantic-ai-agents-tutorial
description: Learn Pydantic AI agents, step by step, using local models and ollama
